Name: Putrefaction 2: Rumble in the hometown
About the game: Hometown of the Void Walker was attacked by crazy cultists, worshipping ancient gods, who he sworn to destroy. Now he must defend his hometown from this invasion and the whole Earth with it! Putrefaction 2: Rumble in the hometown is a stand-alone content pack for Putrefaction 2: Void Walker featuring: 1) New campaign with new levels to explore. 2) New enemy types to fight 3) New secrets to find. 4) Hardcore and improved gameplay.
